sentences.en: Many workers go home from their first day on the job with either a bad headache or a backache—undoubtedly the result of nervous tension.
sentences.cn: 许多员工在第一天上班的时候会带着头痛或背痛回家，这无疑就是紧张情绪造成的结果。
我的背痛要把我折磨死了.

sentences.en: Poor posture will give you backache.

sentences.en: The only way to cure backache is to rest.

sentences.en: This may cause stomach upset, ulcers, headache, backache, high blood pressure and in severe cases can lead to panic attacks or a panic disorder.
